inn1.comm: 121 kph, short one outside off, Guptill sways away
136kph, good length ball on middle and leg as Guptill defends to mid-on
139kph, back of a length and angled in at the body as Guptill works it off his hips to midwicket
137kph, inside edges this fullish delivery outside off. Deflects off his pads and goes towards point

140kph, another short one, this right over middle as Guptill sinks low under it. Bit of swing away after it passes the batsman and Dhoni does well as he had to change direction after moving down the leg side
139kph, back of a length and in the channel as Guptill stays in his crease and pushes it into the covers and that's a maiden
tight line on middle and leg as Ryder is half-forward and defends towards midwicket
131kph, fullish and in the corridor. Curls away from the bat, Ryder is content to leave it alone
length ball, strays on the pads this time and Ryder has no problems clipping it to long leg and gets of the mark
130 kph, classic away swinger to beat the outside edge. Lovely seam position as this is angled in on off stump to lure the batsman into a forward defensive, but the movement away is too good for him
fullish on off stump as he presses forward again and gets it off the outside half of the bat to the covers
leading edge this time as he looks to nudge into midwicket, but Bhuvi's away swing ensures this fullish delivery on the stumps squirts away in front of point
141 kph, back of a length on off stump as he cramps Guptill up.
139 kph, short and on middle and leg again. Guptill was hopping a little at the crease as he looks to block. Takes the thigh pad and falls at his feet
140 kph, good short ball, just outside the off stump without giving too much room. Guptill was looking to hook originally, but then pulled out
bit of confusion there and Ryder makes the right call. Back of a length, just outside off stump as Guptill dabs into the covers and looks for a quick run. Not there
143 kph, just short of a good length as Guptill stays deep in his crease and dabs it more towards point this time.
138kph, fuller and on middle as Guptill moves back and works towards square leg
fullish, but this time it's on the pads and Ryder finds the gap wide of mid-on. There was a bit of seam away, but the line was wrong
there's a Ryder special. Sees a bit of room outside off, stands up and punches it in front of point. Not hit too hard because if it had been that would have been four
fullish on middle and leg as it draws Ryder forward into a defensive push to mid-off. Seams away after pitching to end up on off stump
full and on leg stump, Ryder was looking for the flick but it went off the pads
fullish on middle and leg as Guptill is forward and pushes a bit wide of mid-on, but Aaron looks an improved fielder today, moving quickly to get behind the ball
131 kph, good length ball on off stump as he presses forward and blocks solidly
bouncer first up to Ryder as well, this one a bit down the leg side. Ryder ducks under and watches the umpire stretch his hands out
140kph, just short of a good length and it seams away after pitching. Started just a touch outside off though and Ryder leaves with the angle. Good, quick delivery
140 kph, another Ryder special, though he wouldn't want to see this on the replay. Has a bit of a waft outside off as this is on a good length and angled across him. No footwork and beaten
punched into the covers as this is shorter with a bit of room. Right of the middle as he was balanced on the back foot
loses his radar again, this one off a good length ball. Sprays it down the leg side as Ryder looks to tickle it away, doesn't connect.
139kph, back of a length on and around off stump. Ryder is a little square up as he dabs it towards cover point
wonderful timing from Ryder. This was back of a length and angled across him as Ryder stays put on the back foot and slaps it straight to cover
edged and it flies square of the man at gully. Good length ball probing in that off stump channel as Ryder pokes with an open face.
good length ball on off stump as Ryder can only defend down the pitch

there's the pressure release. A swat over midwicket and it was not too much wrong with the ball, good length on middle and leg. Great timing as he bent his knee and almost swept it away. Two orange shirts waiting, but it's taken by someone else, with two hands
length ball on off stump as he blocks solidly
leans into a gorgeous drive through the covers. Dhawan is the man as he runs and dives to his left, but isn't able to cut the single. It was fullish with a bit of width outside off
full on off stump as Guptill leans forward and turns it to midwicket
132kph, oh, this time he brings the ball in off a good length. But Guptill judges it to be outside off and leaves it alone
full on off stump as he inches forward and pushes to mid-off with a straight bat
140 kph, probes away outside off as he keeps to a good length. Ryder was intending to push it through the covers, but then pulls his bat away

mild appeal as this strikes Ryder just above the pads as he was jumping up and looking to flick it away. Think it pitched outside leg, but either way it was definitely too high. Ryder must have been struck hard as he sinks on his honches at square leg
short of a good length, just outside off as he opens the face off the back foot to point
141 kph, back of a length and keeps it tight on middle and Ryder can only nudge it down to mid-on
135kph, punched into the covers as he angles this across Ryder. Meets the back of a length ball on the front foot and strikes it quite crisply, but can't beat cover
full and it seams away just a touch, Guptill is forward and blocks into extra cover and they pick up a very well judged single. Played with softer hands that time
132 kph, back around the wicket as this is on a length and Ryder goes for it. It's a typical slog and he doesn't connect properly. Plonked his front foot forward and heaved it over mid-on
fullish on and around off stump as Ryder defends it down the pitch

Rahane takes it on the second grab at gully! It was very full and it swings late enough to lure Ryder's outside edge as he looks for a punishing cover drive. Rahane had to dive to his right but he didn't cup it properly first time around, but the ball was parried in the air long enough for him to dive at the ball going behind him and hold it safely
good length ball outside off as Williamson leaves it alone
tails in on off stump and Williamson moves forward, keeps bat and pad together as he blocks
on the pads and he works it down to long leg for a couple. A bit too short and too straight there
clipped behind square leg as Shami bowls back of a good length and on the pads again
137kph, shortish and outside off as Williamson stands up tall and slaps into the covers
back of a length on and on the stumps as Williamson as he tucks it in front of midwicket for a good, quick single

full and a bit of width on offer as Guptill flays it through the covers. It was uppish, but he'd found the gap to the left of the man at cover. Decent timing on that, even if the bat face turned on impact
good length on middle and leg as he shuffles across and dabs towards midwicket
moves it away as he starts on off stump, but Williamson is on the back foot and keeps the bat close to the body and plays it very late down to third man

mis-hit pull and mid-on drops it. It was short and Guptil goes for a front-foot pull. Very late on the shot there and Aaron was in no position to take it. He was diving to the right needlessly because the ball was coming straight at him, around shigh height, and with the balance lost, he shells it
fullish on off stump as he looks to turn it to midwicket, but gets a leading edge
back of a length just outside off as he opens the face and pushes into the covers
short enough for him to go back and cover punch to point with an open face
fullish on that off stump corridor as Guptill is kept to a forward defensive. He really shouldn't be batting out there, bad miss from Aaron
full and tails away just a touch at 138 kph. Williamson is nicely behind it as he blocks back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump as Williamson is balanced on his back foot and defends
138kph, full and probes on the fifth stump line as Williamson watches the ball all the way through to the keeper's gloves as he leaves
lovely straight drive from Williamson, gets forward and brings the full face down on this full dellivery on off stump
goes short and angles it a bit too far down the leg side as Williamson rocks back and hooks down to fine leg. Excellent roll of the wrists and they pick up two
dabs it into the point region with soft hands and looks for the single, but it isn't there. Ends the over with a back of a length delivery outside off
132 kph, angles it in which draws Guptill forward to block, but the ball curls away and beats him. Terrific delivery
fullish and closer to off stump as Guptil this time covers the away swing and blocks off the front foot
launches it straight over the head of the bowler. Another fullish delivery on off stump hit through the line because of the power he has. Not perfectly timed, but he'll feel better after that shot
good length ball on middle as he clips it wide of mid-on and rushes through for a quick single.
bouncer outside off stump to Williamson, who doesn't bother with it. Went around head high
tries another bouncer and this time he isn't so lucky, wide called as this sails over the batsman's head outside off
full and tails down the pads as Williamson goes forward and drives to mid-on
this one he's got hold of. Stands up tall and slaps it through extra cover as this is short and outside off. Solid straight bat comes down on the ball as he hits through the line

this time it's taken at mid-on! Shami gets his buckets under it, well just about. It was on a good length on middle and off and he was looking to clip it through midwicket. But he had played the shot too early and looked to check his shot. Gets a leading edge which lobs to the man at mid-on who runs forward and holds it in his fingertips
short ball to start off and this is at 143 kph. Outside off though so he lets it go
fullish on the stumps as he blocks nicely with a straight bat
144 kph, good length ball speared in on leg stump. Rosco was a little slow on that as it beats his flick and strikes him on the knee-roll. Would have gone down
143 kph, spears it in on middle and this seemed pretty adjacent as Aaron goes up in appeal, only Taylor gets a timely inside edge to it as he came forward to drive to mid-on
on a good length as he clips it behind square leg
flighted on off stump as he moves around the wicket and clips it down to mid-on
full, if a little flat on leg stump as he nudges to midwicket
keeps it tight on middle and off as Taylor keeps it out
pushes this one across the right-hander who was defending down the wrong line. Beaten outside off
spins the other way again as Taylor looks to defend down the ground and gets a thick outside edge past slip
magnificent. Just a bit of width outside off and Taylor's off side play is too good. Strides forward and drives in front of point and it rolls away
143kph, fires it full and down the leg side. Umpire won't let him get away with that

full on off stump and he drives through the line. Just pushed it down the ground with a straight bat and makes sure it beat's Aaron's dive to the right. Neat strike, wasn't looking to hit it too hard at all
short with some width outside off as Williamson cuts over point. Almost carried through to the deep third man
fullish and targeting top of off as Taylor defends from the crease
full and just outside off as Taylor presses forward and squirts it off an open face to the covers
145 kph, absolutely perfect from Taylor. Too full and he moves confidently forward and flays it through the covers. Races away
around the wicket, chips down the track as he reaches the pitch of this tossed up offspinner between midwicket and mid-on
pierces the same gap, only this is a different batsman and he plays from the crease
moves down the track as he flights it outside off. Williamson opens the face as he carves it through point
tossed up on middle and leg as he shuffles across and pushes to mid-on. Shawan slips but they don't take the single as Ashwin runs to help
nudged to mid-on again and Taylor runs with the front foot push and makes it comfortably, despite the throw
tossed up outside off as he pushes into the covers and picks up another good single
back of a length and just outside off as Williamson lets it come on and dabs it past the lone fly slip position
full on middle and it shapes away but Taylor is behind it and defends down the pitch.
145kph, this time through extra cover! A bit too full and Taylor goes forward and hits through the line. Right off the middle and the fielder gives it up pretty quickly. That was too well timed
tightens his line, but strays into the pads because of that. Taylor works it away to long leg
146 kph, rises up on his toes to guides this short ball outside off down to third man. No more slip now
150kph, fullish on off stump as Taylor moves forward and opens the face to find point. Phew, some serious pace from Aaron. But he does stray a touch
moves down the track as he defends this flatter one angled across him
works it away through midwicket despite Ashwin pushing the ball full and across Williamson
chips down the track and drives the tossed up delivery on leg stump to mid-on
advances again as Ashwin shortens his length on leg stump and keeps him to a defensive push
flighted on leg stump as Williamson lofts him over mid-on. But there is protection in the deep as well
this time he's struck it more cleanly. Skipped down the track and though he wasn't to the pitch of it, swung through. Was always looking to use a straight bat and he reaps good benefits from it
142kph, good length ball on off stump as Taylor is solidly behind it
143kph, short and on the body as he jumps back in his crease and works it in front of square leg
147 kph, short and just outside off as Williamson gets on top of the bounce and defends int othe covers
143 kph, just short of a good length as he punches through the covers. Nicely balanced on the back foot there
147 kph, shortish and just outside off again as Taylor hops up and guides it to point

140 kph, short on off stump as Taylor defends towards where short leg might have been. Though he's testing the middle of the pitch, he's not giving any room for the batsman to exploit. Looks like he's learned from the previous game
good work at deep midwicket as Dhawan dives to his left. It was tossed up on leg stump and Willliamson charges him and lofts over the infield. Clean strike
a little shorter, and pushed through quicker on leg stump as he clips it through midwicket off the back foot
flighted on middle and leg as Taylor comes forward and pushes towards mid-on
goes on with the arm as Taylor moves back and outside off stump as he works it wide of mid-on but not far enough
tossed up on leg stump as he leans forward and works it through to deep midwicket
touch shorter on leg stump as Williamson goes back and clips it through square leg for an easy single
145 kph, full and strays a bit down the leg side, Williamson was looking to clip it away square, but it goes off the pads
146kph, shortish and a bit outside off. Lures Taylor to cut. But he gets a very thick edge and it goes too fine for deep third man to be in play.
back of a length at 147 kph as Taylor jumps back and blocks this one just outside off
143 kph, too wide outside off this time and Taylor has no trouble slapping over and behind point. Easy put away as that brings up the fifty partnership between these two
150kph, corrects his line as this is fuller and seeking top of off. Taylor moves forward and blocks
short of a length and outside off stump as he cuts it to deep point
flighted on middle as Taylor drives past a diving Ashwin. One of the few he's flighted today
flatter on leg stump as Williamson skips down the track and works him away to deep midwicket
good length ball, which hardly turns, on off stump as Taylor pushes it back down the pitch
Taylor leans forward and opens the face as this is tossed up on off stump. Quick single through the covers
flighted on the pads as he brings a straight bat down on it
touch too short and Taylor moves outside leg and cuts behind point. Boy, how quickly did he get into position, and did someone get the number of the bat swing on that!
good length ball pushed through on leg stump as Willliamson goes back and punches down the ground
full and flat on off stump as Williamson pushes to mid-off
bit more air but he still stays back in his crease and slices the ball to short third man
stands up tall as he pushes this length ball on middle to long-on. No spin in this pitch
fullish on the stumps as he goes back and pushes towards mid-on
stands up tall as this is on a good length and pushed across him. Not good fielding in the covers as they pick up two
flighted on leg stump as he chips down the track and drives to Ashwin
driven down the ground back to the bowler again as this is flighted on middle
brilliant footwork! charges down and lofts him over extra cover. Made a little bit of room as well and has timed this to perfection
chips down the track and this time he hits Ashwin straight over his head
turned past square leg for a single as Ashwin shortens his length. Brilliant batting against spin.
too close to cut as he gets a bit of a bottom edge as this was a touch fuller on fourth stump.
full on off stump as he defends towards mid-on
was in position for the sweep quite early and though Jadeja speared it outside off stump, he's able to beat short fine
fires it down the pads as Taylor moves across to the off side and tickles it fine. They hustle through for three runs, taking one of them off the throw
flighted on middle as he goes back and pushes down the ground. Jadeja runs to his right and dives to keep that to none
advances down the track as he gets to the pitch and drives to long-off
waist high full toss to start and Williamson punches it to mid-on. Both the batsman and the bowler have wry smiles
full and angled in on off stump as he moves forward and drive back to the bowler
short and wide outside off as he rocks back and cuts in front of point
darts in off the pitch as this is fullish and outside off. Taylor works the angle as he pushes to mid-on
full and outside off as he drives towards mid-off
full and angled in at him as Taylor pushes to mid-on. Nice, tight start from the part-timer
fullish on off stump as he defends down the ground
touch short as he moves outside leg and cuts towards point
nudged towards deep midwicket as this is full on leg
too straight, even if it is full. Taylor glances it fine to pick up three
good length just outside off as Williamson is on the back foot and dabs to backward point
tossed up outside off as he moves across to try and sweep. Struck on the top flap as Jadeja appeals, but he was outside the line
very tight single there and they're quick enough to make it. Shortish and outside off as he dabs it softly towards point
touch too full to cut there as he is beaten outside off
mores in as he keeps it full and Williamson is forward and opens the face to short third man
touch too short and quite wide outside off as he slaps it straight to the fielder at point
full and angled in as Taylor strides forward and drives to deep cover point
length ball as he goes back and works it off his hips to deep square leg
bit of turn outside off as Taylor moves back and across and opens the face to short third man
fullish on off stump as he steps forward to defend
cuts it and finds the gap behind point. Took it from the stumps as he made a bit of room and places it to the left of the man in the deep as well
full and fired in down the pads as Williamson looks to glance it down. Dhoni goes up in appeal as he takes it nicely, but it had come off the pad
tossed up just outside off as he drives down to long-off
turns it away to backward square leg as this is fullish and on the pads
full and just outside off as he looks to drive through the covers. A little too early into the shot as he gets a bit of an edge down the ground
there's his fifth fifty in five matches! Full on middle stump and he calmly pushes it to long-on and raises his bat. Becomes the second player to do that in a five-match series
back of a length and angled in on off stump as he dabs it to backward point for a quick single
touch short and with a bit of width as well as Taylor steers it behind short third man
goes down with this full ball wide of off stump and opens the face to pick up a single to short third man
cuts but it goes straight to point this time. Too short from Kohli again
good length ball on the pads as he looks to whip it away behind square leg
that's a double whammy. Taylor's fifty and the hundred partnership as he drives this tossed up delivery on middle to long-on
a bit short on off stump as he cuts to short third man
flatter delivery on off stump as he pushes back to the bowler
just enough flight and he sweeps it from outside off and gets well fine of the man at short third man. Lovely footwork and timing
and again, this time squarer and he's got a lot more bat on this. Even Jadeja's looking clueless as Williamson gets down on one knee and takes this from outside off as well
length ball on off stump as he steps towards leg and steers it in front of point
looks to hit this a little too hard and gets a bottom edge as this is on a length and wide of off
full and wide outside off as he drives through to deep cover
short and angled in again as Taylor cuts to point
opens the face as this comes in at him off a length. Point does better this time as he rushes forward and dives
fullish and on middle and leg as he drives to long-on
tossed up on middle and leg as he drives to long off. Bit inside out there
has his weight on the back foot as this is tossed up on middle and off and he steers this away to deep cover
cut away quite fine. It was flatter and quicker on off stump and yet he manage to get it fine of short third man
big appeal from Jadeja as he fires this in on middle and leg. Going down though
reaches forward as he defends to the off side
full on middle and leg as he defends with bat in front of pad
dragged it too far short for the pace he bowls. Williamson goes back and pulls powerfully
driven back to the bowler
bit more width outside off as he moves forward and flays it through the covers
low full toss on off stump as he whips it to long-on
chopped to point and he doesn't time it properly as this goes off the bottom of the bat to point
full on off stump as he drives solidly to long-off
inside out over extra again! He's just too good with that stroke. Moved down the track, reached the pitch and lofted it over the man in the infield despite his leap
blocked back to the bowler as this is flatter and on middle
pushed down to mid-on as this is fullish on leg stump
bit more flight as he drives to long-off. Jadeja himself races after the ball, but has to pull away as the man in the deep runs in
flighted on off stump as he pushes to long-off with a giant stride forward
full on middle and leg as he leans forward and turns it around to square leg
full on off stump as he presses forward and drives back down the ground. The ball ricochets off the bowler for a single to mid-on
136 kph, bit if width outside off as this is on a length. Taylor chops it away to point. Normally in this series he's beaten that man
131 kph, full on middle as he works it down the ground to long-on

magic! Plonks his front foot forward as he picked up the slower ball and lofted him straight over long-off. Just an extension of defence and it's been perfectly timed. There's an man in the orange shirt who gets a hand to it but can't hold on. 100 grand drop
dabs it into the point region as this is shortish and on and around off stump
opens the face as he finds point again as this is on a length around off stump
good length ball just outside off as Taylor comes forward and blocks
falls just short of the bowler. Fullish on off and Taylor was into his defensive push a little early and the ball nearly lobbed back to Bhuvi.
full and fired down the leg side as Taylor moved across outside off and looked to slog it away into the leg side
there's that slog over midwicket that the old Taylor was famous for. Good length ball on off stump and he went forward and smacked it over the infield
whipped away off his hips through square leg as this is a touch short and down leg
ramped it right over the keeper's head for another boundary. It was dug in very short and Williamson got in line, swayed away and helps it along
the more orthodox steer to deep third man as this is back of a length outside off. Partnership moves to 150
back of a length just outside off as Williamson lets it come on and dabs to deep third man
whipped away to deep square leg. Very strong wristwork as this was a length ball that tails into him

he won't get his hundred. Fullish delivery outside off as he goes for the front foot slice over point, but Rahane jumps up and picks up a smart catch. He's been playing that shot over extra all this time, could have gone for that option again instead of trying to hit square. Nonetheless, he's set New Zealand up for a mighty good score again
back of a length on middle and leg as he nudges it in front of square leg
just a bit too much room on offer as he gets a thickish edge to deep third man
143kph, back of a length on off stump even as he comes forward and opens the face to nudge into the covers
back of a length and down the pads as Taylor glances it fine and picks up another simple boundary
edged and through to deep third man as this is shortish and outside off. Taylor was looking to drive on the up
drilled into the covers but Rohit does well. Fullish and just outside off as he comes forward and unleashes a powerful drive
slower short ball and it had a bit of room outside off too. Taylor was into position too early and tried to adjust his cut shot, but misses
angled in on middle as he pushes into the covers with soft hands for a single
off the thigh pad this time as it is short of a length and tailing down leg. Looks to flick it away, but can't connect
chance in the crowd but the orange shirts miss out again. Short on middle as he swivels on the back foot and pulls it over square leg. Strong stroke
back of a length outside off as he opens the face and dabs into the covers
fullish and just outside off as he leans forward and drives to mid-off.
149kph, yorker and it moves away rather late too. Baz looks to carve it through point but misses
full on off stump and a diving effort from Rohit at cover saves a boundary. Baz had got forward quickly and drilled it
length ball just outside off as he looks to cut, there was a bit of away movement again which makes him miss the ball
flighted on middle and leg as he draws the batsman forward. Blocked into the leg side and they scurry through for the single
fullish on off stump as he draws the batsman forward to defend
good length ball on off stump again as Taylor pushes towards mid-off but Jadeja gets in between
goes shorter outside off as he rocks back and cuts to short third man
flat on middle and off as he shuffles outside off and clips through midwicket
pushed down to long-on as he flights it on middle. Jadeja had to run around the non-striker and wasn't able to stop the ball despite sticking his boot out
good length ball just outside off as he cuts to deep point
full and angled in on off stump as he gets a good stride forward and drills it to long-on
bit more width on offer as he gets on the front foot and drives to deep cover
touch quicker and it moves in as well. Baz was shapeing to late cut it but there wasn't enough room and he had to bring down a straight bat
fullish on and around off as he pushes it through the off side
strides forward and drives the full length ball back down the pitch. Kohli dives to his right to prevent the single
goes down the track even if Jadeja had bowled this flat and cramped him for room. Baz swings it away wide of long-on and picks up a useful boundary

oh, he slides then slips and would have been out on had it hit direct. It was fired in on off stump and Baz was looking to go so far forward that he slips. Then while running, he stumbles. Rohit had enough time to throw the stumps down but misses
dropped charges him and lofts the length ball straight over the top. Shami was the man coming round from long-on and he shells a relatively simple catch
goes back and cuts behind point as this is a touch short and wide outside off
slog sweep over midwicket and he has got all of this. The first six for Taylor in this series and it's the old faithful. Overpitched outside off and he creams it after going down on one knee
this time its a full toss outside off and Taylor moves across to the off side and sweeps it all along the ground through square leg
full and wide outside off as he drives to deep point
short and wide outside off as Baz rocks back and cuts through the covers. The man in the deep has a lot of work to do as this was timed quite well.

slapped straight to cover! Charged down the track and was looking to beat the fielder inside the circle. Was making a bit of room for himself and may have ended up going too leg side as he doesn't get enough bat on it
length ball just outside off as he opens the face to steer to point
140kph, fullsh and just outside off as Taylor moves across and drives to long-on
back of a length and angled across the left-hander as he guides to point off the back foot
143kph, shortish on middle as Neesham goes back and pulls through square leg. Didn't get all of it though
full on middle as he leans forward and clips to deep midwicket
147kph, full and a bit wide outside off. Neesham's feet don't move much as he looks to drive through the covers and gets a thick bottom edge
145kph, pulls over midwicket! Think he was waiting for that as Aaron goes for the short ball, but this has some room for Neesham to swing his arms and swing he does.
136 kph, yorker on off stump as he manages to dig it out
137kph, nice and full on middle again as Taylor is forward and drives to long-on
137kph, keeps to a full length on middle and off as Neesham brings down a straight bat. Timed it well enough to ensure the bowler misfields as he sticks out a hand
neat little couple as Taylor nudges this very full length delivery on middle down to long-on. Very good awareness of the field and how hard he's hit it
another yorker from Shami, this one on middle and off as he keeps Taylor to a defensive push down the pitch
137 kph, overpitched this time and it had a little bit of room too. Taylor goes for the cover drive but he can't beat the infield. Has to settle for a single
right up there on middle and leg as he clips to midwicket.
147kph, a bit overpitched on off stump as he drives through extra cover. Taylor wanted a couple, but it's not there
147 kph, full toss on middle as he looks to swing it away. Gets an inside edge onto the back of his front knee and they scurry through for the single
very full on middle as Taylor is forward and pushes to long-on
full and wide outside off, Neesham makes no effort to move his feet as he throws his hands at it. Gets a thick inside edge past the keeper
147kph, pitched right up on leg stump as he was looking to clip it through square leg. Too slow on the shot as it runs away off his pads
138 kph, good length ball but he's stuck on the back foot as he looked to pull. Gets a big inside edge and goes to the other end
on a length as this is the slower ball, Offcutter on the pads as Taylor looks to work it behind square leg, but the ball dribbles away off his pads
gets under this and sends it into the crowd over long-on. It was in the slot as Shami tries another slower ball. The bat did turn in his hand he swung hard and benefits
yorker on middle and off, good reply as Neesham keeps it out. Good reply from the bowler
consecutive hundreds for Taylor! It was short and on middle, he rocked back and pulled well in front of midwicket and collects a lovely boundary. Wellington stands up to applaud

and finally India hold on to a catch. Dhawan at deep midwicket does a very good job as he picks up a skier. Slower ball outside off stump as he goes down on one knee and looks for that slog sweep again. He's mis-hit it though and Dhawan moves to his left and dives to pick up a good catch.
very full outside off as he comes forward and gets it down to to long-on
full on middle and leg as he looks to power it straight down the ground, but gets an inside edge onto pad
low full toss on off stump as he stretches forward and hits it dead straight for a boundary. Right off the middle
full and just outside off but Ronchi's timed this brilliantly. Just missed the yorker and it had a bit of room outside off as he slaps it down to the long-off boundary
gets the yorker in this time as Ronchi can only dig it past the bowler on the off side
moves his front foot leg side as this is in the blockhole as well, bit of width allows Neesham to punch to long-off

gifts a full toss on off stump and he smacks it over deep midwicket. Flat, hard and monstrously hit. An orange shirt leans over the balcony to try and pluck some cash, dangerous stuff, if not for his mate clinging onto his trousers and balancing him
full toss outside off and this is flayed away over point. Powerful strike again and India are staring down another 300-plus score
and there it is, overpitched on leg stump and he gets forward and whips it away effortlessly over square leg. Searching for the yorker but has missed his length by just a little
full on middle and leg as he clips to deep midwicket all along the ground
yorker on off stump as he takes his front leg out of the way to drive down the ground. Only manages an inside edge

looks to try something cute as he moves right across outside off and tries to scoop this full length ball over fine leg. Would have done better to stay in his crease and belt that through the covers. Ronchi sneaks in a bye and that ends a pretty solid batting performance by New Zealand

inn2.comm: full on off stump as he draws Rohit forward to defend
fullish and on off again as Rohit blocks off the front foot
back of a length just outside off as Rohit opens the face to guide it into the covers. Wanted a single, but it wasn't there
width outside off as Rohit leans into a lovely square drive. Timed nicely off the front foot, but it finds point
back of a length on middle as Rohit stays in line and pushes down the pitch
loose that time as he looks to drive on the up. Poking well away from the body as this was on a length outside off. Beaten
135 kph, gets a bit of shape away from Dhawan as this is on a fuller length and outside off. Watchfully left alone
137 kph, fullish on off stump as he stretches forward to block with bat and pad close together
140 kph, fullish and just a touch outside off as Dhawan looked to pierce the cover field. Touch of movement in foils the shot as it is mis-hit to mid-on and they sneak a single
139kph, shortish and angles it across as Rohit stands up on his toes and guides it off an open face to third man
too straight as this length ball is turned behind square leg
139kph, good probing line from Mitch as this is fullish and just outside off. Rohit lets it go through
127kph, bouncer over middle and leg as Dhawan ducks underneath.
squares him up with a back of a length ball pushed across him. Dhawan manages to ride it to point
full and just outside off and Dhawan's usual timing is off hiding somewhere. Drives down the ground, but gets more of an edge to mid-off
another good short ball, this one pushed across Dhawan, who sways inside the line
fullish and very tight on off stump as Dhawan presses forward to block

almost sold him down the river, but they pick up the single eventually off the overthrow. Dabs the back of a length ball on off into the covers and took a few steps. Rohit responded only to see Dhawan change his mind. The underarm throw is not accurate though
short with a bit of width as Dhawan looks to send it up and over point. A bit too slow on it as it bounces over the flashing blade

Nathan's pounched  one at second slip, has he? No, he's uncertain. And it's bounced just short of him. Genuine edge from Dhawan as this was back of a length on off stump. Poked at it with hard hands and is lucky it didn't carry
goes on the bounce to deep third man. Touch of width outside off and he cuts strongly. McClenaghan thought it was going straight down his throat
140kph, short delivery again tucking him up above his stomach as Rohit is up off his feet to drop it down towards midwicket
worked this away between square leg and midwicket as he raises the front leg off the ground and works the short ball outside off away
140kph, fullish on middle as Dhawan goes forward and pushes down the ground
fullish on off stump and Rohit is unable to do much more than defend it back to the bowler
forces the pace as he moves outside leg and lofts this length ball over mid-off. Didn't time it properly and it holds up in the outfield near the boundary

oh my, he's given a spot of catching practice to first slip! Taylor's stunned at how easy it all was. Short of a length ball just outside off and he went to guide it to third man, forgetting there are two slips in place. It goes too fine and he succumbs to a catch above shoulder-height
shortish and outside off as Kohli sways inside the line of it
rock-solid behind this back of a length ball on off stump
goes wide of the crease as this is angled in on a good length, left alone by Kohli
first sign of Henry as he dives to his right at mid-on to save a few runs. It was nicely timed by Dhawan as he presents a straight bat to the full ball on middle
back of a length on off stump as he blocks
140kph, shortish and outside off as he opens the face and carves to point off the back foot
goes a touch fuller and keeps it on a fifth stump line, Dhawan doesn't want to play
it was hit a little uppishly, but he's placed it to the left of mid-on. Touch too full and straight as Dhawan clips it off the front foot through midwicket
143 kph, he's nailed that! Full and a bit wide of off and Dhawan leans into a punishing cover drive, but can't beat the man in the infield
length ball outside off as Kohli shoulders arms
leans forward into the drive to mid-off as Mills pitches it up outside off
full and angled in on middle and off as Kohli steps forward and blocks. No easy runs on offer
good length ball just outside off as Kohli dabs it with an open face to point
strays too straight and Kohli capitalises. Leans forward and clips smartly straight of midwicket with a roll of his wrists. Good running gives them three
back of a length on middle as Dhawan can only knock it back to the bowler
136 kph, back of a length and it darts back off the pitch. Kohli wasn't expecting that as he is slow on his flick. Too skiddy for him as it goes off his thigh pad
137 kph, gets good carry through to the keeper as this is back of a length and outside off. Kohli lets it go
140kph, dismissed! Banged in too short and Kohli is on the back foot and lays into this. Saw it early and hit it so hard through midwicket
141kph, good length ball outside off, much better in line as Kohli leaves
135 kph, bit of shape away as this is fuller and just outside off. Kohli is drawn forward and into a tame poke, beaten
140 kph, just short of a good length and this moves in after pitching. Still well enough outside off for Kohli not to play at it
good length ball on off stump as Dhawan pushes from the crease into the covers
back of a length on off stump as Dhawan chops it to deep third man
fullish and just outside off as he leans nicely forward and blocks
solid front foot stride and punches this right back at the bowler. Crisp drive on the up from Kohli, for no runs. That might develop into a bruise for Mills
short and wide outside off and Kohli was into the cut too early. Frustrated yell from him as this is mistimed into the covers
back of a length and outside off, Kohli looks to drop it into the off side and run, but the fielders are too quick
138 kph, keeps it on and around off stump as Dhawan goes back and defends into the covers
139 kph, fullish and tight on the stumps as Dhawan looks to whip it through midwicket. Only manages an inside edge onto pad
appreciable curl in at 140 kph as this is pitched right up there. Dhawan is forced to hurry in his efforts to keep the ball out of his stumps
bouncer on middle nad leg to follow up as Dhawan ducks under it

maiden wicket for Henry and it's a pretty good one to as he draws Dhawan's edge and is pouched at second slip. It was back of a length and pushed across the left-hander, who pokes at it with the back foot moving down the leg side and away from the ball. He did try to rein the bat in, but it was too late.
fullish and it moves away as Rahane lets this go outside off
back of a length on off stump and Kohli looks to work it away to midwicket with India under some scoreboard pressure. Can't beat the bowler
bit of width on offer as Kohli stays back and steers the shotish ball to deep point
nice line there from Mills as he plugs away in that off-stump channel. Rahane lets this go as well
back of a length quite wide outside off and it is allowed through to the keeper
short ball outside off stump, Rahane sways inside the line
steady line outside off and Rahane is content to let the keeper worry about this
sees some width outside off and throws his bat at it. Gets a thick outside edge to deep third man as the substitute fielder pulls out a terrific dive to keep it to two
pulled over wide mid-on as this is short and just outside off. Kohli decided to take up the mantle here and the man in the deep tidies up
full on middle and leg and that is meat and drink for Kohli as he clips it away to deep midwicket
back of a length on off stump as Kohli blocks with an open face to point
138kph, full on off stump as Kohli punches off the front foot to mid-off. Lovely straight bat
fullish and it curls away just a touch too. Kohli is behind it as he defends it under his eyes
back of a length and angled across him as Rahane opens the face of his bat and guides it behind point
fullish on leg stump as Kohli moves forward and works it away towards deep midwicket
full and angled across the right-hander as Rahane shoulders arms
tucked away off his pads to deep midwicket
sucker ball and Kohli was almost lured in. Full and angled across him and he was looking to flay it through the covers. But decides to leave it instead

oh, is that a catch? Guptill, the fielder, says no straight away. It was full and angled across Kohli again. A littler closer to him this time as he goes for the drive on the up. Goes in the air to cover and doesn't carry
full on middle and leg as he comes forward and dives to mid-on
another one for Henry! And Rahane's missed a straight one! He was swinging across the line to a fullish delivery angled in at him. Struck in line with the stumps and would have crashed into middle
fullish and curls away outside off, left alone
good length ball on middle and off as he blocks
strays on the pads as he clips it away to deep midwicket and that's just two. Should have gone for the extra one there. It went almost all the way to the boundary
good length ball outside off, goes just inside the wide line as Rayudu leaves
fullish and angled across him as Kohli strides forward to block
dug in short and angled across him as Kohli belts the pull down and to deep midwicket
good short ball, right over middle as Rayudu has to sink to his knees and sway away
rooted to the crease as he flashes at this shortish ball just outside off. Beaten
gets a bit of curve in on middle and leg as Rayudu clips it towards deep midwicket. Good timing as he got his front foot out of the way
back of a length and pushed across the right-hander who is happy to let it go through
fullish and seeking the off stump as Rayudu blocks from his crease
bit of movement away for Henry, only this was a half-volley outside off. Rayudu gets a nice stride forward and drives through the covers. Full flow of the bat and India get a much needed boundary
full and a bit wide of off again, this time Rayudu's timing deserts him as it goes off the bottom of the bat down the ground, more swing away
good length ball outside off, Rayudu won't bother with this
136kph, extracts some bounce off the wicket as this is on a good length outside off. Rayudu won't be drawn into a stroke
full and just outside off as he goes for a drive. Gets a thick outside edge down to third man and that will be drinks
bit of width on offer but Rayudu can only chop it as far as point
shortish and wide again, but Rayudu had already moved his front leg outside leg stump. Which means he has too much room and the cut shot goes to gully
this time gets it past the infield, but deep point is there to field this cut shot off the shorter ball outside off
bouncer on middle as Kohli is on the back foot and hooks down and to deep square leg
136kph, bouncer on middle as Rayudu sways inside the line and looks to ramp it over third man. Was playing a bit inside the line there. And possibly beaten for pace
136 kph, charges him but McClenaghan has seen it. Seemed to have changed his action a touch as he dug this in short and ensured the ball sailed over his flashing blade outside off
strays on the pads and Kohli picks up another timely boundary. Tickles it fine to the long leg boundary and really that was all he had to do
good length ball outside off stump as Kohli refrains from playing
back of a length on off stump as Kohli defends down the pitch
keeps it just outside off as Kohli is happy to leave this short of a good length ball
again a touch wide of off stump and Kohli prefers not to play
overpitched on middle as Kohli strides forward and presents a dead straight bat. Second boundary off the over and possibly the best of the innings so far. Not that there's a whole lot to choose from
tossed up on off stump as he moves forward and drives back to the bowler
chips down the track as he shortens the length. Works it away to midwicket
wanders down the track as he stays outside leg and hits into the covers
another trek down the pitch as he pulls the length back and finds cover
pushed down the ground as he strides forward to the length ball on off stump
strays a bit too straight as he clips it to deep square leg
full and just outside off as Kohli strides forward and hits to mid-on
beats mid-on this time. Gorgeous stroke from Kohli as this was a little too full on middle and he hits down the ground.
good length ball on and around off stump as Kohli is squared up a touch. Outside edge is taken as it runs down to third man
back of a length on off stump as he stays beside the ball and steers down to third man. Much more in control there
back of a length outside off as he dabs towards backward point
through him! Rayudu rushes down the track but this seems to be a little too quick for him. Good bounce for Neesham too as this beats his push and goes to the keeper
goes back as this a touch short and punches it to mdwicket
flighted on off stump as he strides forward and whips it straight of midwicket
tucks him up with a flatter one on and around off stump as he chops it into the covers
cut away, and does it well. Bit too short as he makes room outside leg and gets it past the infield.
punched back to the bowler as this is on a good length on middle
too straight this time as Rayudu works it to deep midwicket
drops short of first slip. Seemed to have checked his shot as he tried to guide it towards third man. Neesham continues with his back of a length deliveries outside off
shortish again as Rayudu pulls off one leg to deep midwicket
seems to skid off the pitch and gain some carry as this is on a good length and outside off. Kohli leaves
belts it over long-off. Kohli unleashes the full swing of the bat and pockets a six. Length ball outside off and he launches it away
shortish on the pads as he turns it away towards deep square leg
dabs it in front of point as N Mac dives and keeps it to a single. Touch of room outside off and they use it to pick up a quick single
shortish on leg stump as he goes back and clips it to deep square leg
looks for the whippy drive through midwicket, but gets a thick inside edge onto his boot
flat and on a length as he goes back to defend
leans forward as he works the flighted ball through midwicket
flat on middle as he punches back to the bowler
flicked behind square leg as this is given a bit more flight on leg stump
136 kph, fullish on off stump as he steps forward to block
moves outside leg as this is fullish on leg stump and he drives to mid-off
short and just outside off as Rayudu make some room again and guides it past backward point
bouncer, but directed down leg as Kohli pulls to the man behind square in the deep. Kept it down again, he's been very good on that stroke
good length ball, targeting top of off as Rayudu chops from the crease towards point

gone, caught at gully and that's Henry's third wicket on debut. Made a little room outside leg to slice this full delivery over square on the off side, but Williamsom stretches his hands above his head and picks up a smart catch
flighted on leg stump as he leans forward and drives to long-on
full and flat on middle as Dhoni blocks back to the bowler
fired in on the pads and it strikes those big ones of Dhoni's and wanders towards fine leg
defended off the back foot into the leg side
stays in the crease and turns the full length ball to midwicket
short and fired in down the leg side and Dhoni looks to beat short fine leg as he hacks down on the ball
steered to deep point as he sees a bit of width attached to this ball
short on middle and off as Dhoni pulls and does so quite strongly. Deep square leg only had to take only a couple of strides but he still needed a drive as the India captain moves to 8000 runs
flicked straight of midwicket as this is on a length and on middle
137 kph, gets the ball to lift off back of a length and Dhoni, who was looking to play first up, pull his bat out of the way
nice and tight on middle as Dhoni moves back and looks to clip past the man at midwicket, doesn't quite do so
gets a thick inside edge as his feet forget to move while going for the flick. This was full on middle and off
nicely flighted outside off as Dhoni dances down the track and hits it to long-off
straight bat meets the tossed up delivery outside off as they pick up a single down the ground
charges him and slaps this fuller offspinner to cover
tossed up on middle as he blocks down the pitch
touch short and goes on with the arm as Dhoni cuts into the covers
flighted just outside off as Dhoni goes forward and hits to long-on
cramps him for room as this is shortish and on off stump. Dhoni was shaping to cut and in the end has to settle to getting bat on ball rather awkwardly
short of a good length and outside off as Dhoni lets it go. Two slips are their waiting for the edge as there are seven men in the circle
low full toss on off stump as Dhoni drives to the right of the man at mid-off
opens the face as he slices this delivery on off stump to point
yorker, just outside off as he digs it out into the covers
short and wide that time and Dhoni punishes it. Rocks back and cuts between point and cover. Loads more of those needed for India
chips forward as he works the tossed up delivery through square leg
advances and nearly yorks himself as he pushes the flighted ball on off stump back to N Mac
shortish on off stump as Dhoni goes back and pushes into the covers
pushed down to long-on as this is on a length on middle and leg
strides forward to meet this tossed up ball on leg stump and picks up a single to long-off
nudged to the right of midwicket as he lunges forward to meet this flighted ball on middle
starts off with a short one which Dhoni pulls to deep midwicket powerfully

straightens off the pitch but there are no slips for Kohli. Regulation outside edge as he is squared up while defending this back of a length ball outside off. Streaky boundary to go through to his fifty
would have preferred to get to the landmark off that shot. Charged him and just lashed it over long-on. Magnificent wristwork. Another orange shirt shells it
fullish on middle and leg as he defends off the back foot
leans forward as this is full and wide, goes uppishly but well behind point for a single
good length, shaping in just a touch as Dhoni leaves it after seeing it started well outside off
you beauty! what timing on that! He beats the man inside the circle, then bisects deep midwicket and long-on as he strode down the track and muscled it away
nips down the track while making some room for himself as he drives through extra
shortish with a little room outside off as Dhoni cuts but can't beat the infield
too straight with the length ball as Dhoni works it behind square leg
full on middle as Kohli this time decides to go back and work to midwicket
tossed up a little on middle and leg as Kohli drives to long-on
full and a bit wide of off stump, but Kohli brings those wrists into play again as he drives to mid-on
on the front foot and slaps it through extra cover. It was shortish and outside off and he gets on top of that and powers it through the gap
short ball just outside off as he pulls it through midwicket
back of a length around the off stump as Dhoni moves back and nudges it square on the leg side
another pull, this one to the right of midwicket and he's got a good chunk of this as the ball bounces just once before reaching Guptill in the deep
good length ball just outside off as Dhoni strides forward and pushes in front of point for a single
fullish and just outside off as Dhoni goes back and slaps it down to long-off. They hustle through for two and MS is struck as the throw comes in. Has a smile on his face though, that would have hurt
was waiting for the shot and misses it he tried to carve it away through point. Flat, but slower through the air
looked to charge him this time, but he beats him in flight as Dhoni can only defend
worked away off the pads as he bowls a bit too straight
Kohli's turn to flick it away to deep square leg as this is full and on leg stump
drilled to long-on as Dhoni gets forward to the full length ball on middle and off to bring up the fifty partnership off only 54 balls
rocks back and pulls on one leg to deep square leg. Touch too short to start off with but then again, he has the field for that
wasn't that a top edge? Seems not as Kohli sends it way into the crowd behind deep midwicket. Short ball punished as he rocked back to pull
tests him out again as Kohli pulls into the deep again
goes back in his crease as Dhoni blocks in front of the pitch. Kohli calls him through for the single, evades McClenaghan who was going for the run out and makes it
full and on the pads as he looked to flick, but it hits his pads towards square leg
banged and cramps him just outside off. Dhoni looks to hook, but he can't get hold of it as the ball wanders away towards square leg
flat and pretty quick on leg stump as Dhoni looks to flick it fine, but gets hit on the pads

big appeal as Dhoni pulls out the sweep as this is full and flat. It pitched in line and struck him in line too. Looked good to crash into the stumps but the umpire Bowden disagrees. Dhoni has an escape
short of a good length on the pads as he works it away behind square leg
driven down the ground as this is full on the stumps
full on leg, lunges forward and turns it to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump as Dhoni only dabs it away towards mid-off. That will be drinks
punched off the front foot to mid-off as this good length ball is angled across him
140kph, just short of a good length as Dhoni covers his stumps and blocks into the leg side
bouncer over middle and off, but it was a bit too high as Dhoni wanted to swat it down through mid-on
short again, this one at 111 kph, as Dhoni pulls through midwicket for a couple
changes his action again as this is back of a length on and around off stump as Dhoni gets back in line to block
back of a length just outside off as Dhoni looks to slap it through the covers, but gets an inside edge onto boot.
another inside edge as he looked to smoke it away over long-on. Very little footwork on that occasion as he jams the ball onto his pads off the inside edge again

holed out at long-on and is that it for India? Tossed it up on middle and leg as Kohli charged him and lofts over the top. Watches it intently, hoping that it would  clear the substitute fielder but no such luck. Fighting innings from Kohli comes to an end
good length ball on middle as he comes forward to block
flighted on middle and leg as he drives back to the bowler
worked away towards square leg
nudged into the midwicket region as this is flat on middle and leg
tossed up on off stump as he defends back to the bowler. Ends a terrific spell of bowling from N Mac: 10-1-33-1
bad start to the final over of the powreplay. Short and outside leg as Dhoni pulls it to the long leg boundary
back of a length outside off as Dhoni stands tall and punches into the covers, well stocked field there

the captain's dropped it. Fullish on middle and leg as Dhoni plants his front foot down and hits through the line. Doesn't get the elevation he wants as Baz dives forward shells a reasonably simple catch

pulled past the bowler! It was short and had a bit of room outside off as he flat-bats it down the ground. McClenaghan might have got an outstretched finger on it as Baz chases after it down and pulls out a terrific dive. It was heading to the boundary but he dived headlong after the ball and pulled it back. Top class fielding
shortish and outside off as he pulls to midwicket
slower short ball at 115 kph, as Ashwin swivels on the back foot and pulls in the air through the vacant square leg area to end the powerplay
cut away between short third man and point. Crisp strike as he starts off with a short and wide delivery. Ashwin's timing shines through there
tossed up down the leg side as he works it to long leg off the front foot
very full on middle and leg as Dhoni drives to midwicket
driven back to the bowler as this is flighted on middle
rushed down the track and drills back to the bowler
touch shorter as he sticks to a leg stump line, which is what he should bowl with all his deep fielders there, as Dhoni works it through to deep square leg
back of a length outside off as Dhoni hops a bit and nudges it towards midwicket
he's smoked that! Short ball and he slams it wide of mid-on. Awesome power on the stroke, but is it a bit too late?
shortish and just a bit wide of off as he slaps it down to mid-off
full and angled across him as he moves forward and drives past the man at cover
opens the face as he drives to the right of point. It was full and angled across him, inviting that shot
short and outside off as he pulls down to deep midwicket and Guptill keeps it to one
charges him and drills down the ground for a single
makes tons of room for himself and looks to cut, misses the fuller ball altogether and his stumps are disturbed. Williamson's bit for Man of the Series becomes stronger
flighted outside off stump as he drives into the covers
full toss, outside off as Dhoni opens the face and drives through extra cover
goes down the track and yorks himself as this one is full and outside leg. Hit to midwicket
driven back to the bowler as this is fired in fullish on off stump
fullish and angled across Jadeja as he lets it go

charges this length ball outside off and slashes it through the covers. Guptill move to his left and dives and seems to have it under control until the back foot kicks it to the boundary. Punches the turf in disappointment
stayed leg side as this is is on a fuller length and just outside off. Looks to dab it away to third man, but is beaten
full on middle as Jadeja blocks off the front foot

safe as houses is Guptill at the point boundary. Mills has his second as the batsman charges him and looks to slap him over the top. Had to do that considering the run-rate was north of 14 but doesn't get hold of it at all
around the wicket now as this is full and strikes Dhoni on the pads as he looked to flick it away. Pitched outside leg though, outrageously optimistic appeal there
flighted outside off as Bhuvi drives into the covers off the front foot
flighted around leg stump as he nudges it to deep midwicket
full toss outside off as Dhoni smears it to midwicket. Falls just short of the fielder as he dived forward
fuller on leg stump as he turns it around to long leg
pushed down to long-on as this is flighted on middle and leg
fired in flat on leg stump as Dhoni whips it away to deep square leg
charges him as Mills continues around and keeps it nice and full on leg stump, gets a thick inside edge through to long leg
back over to the new batsman as this is on a fullish length as he defends
back of a length just outside off as he blocks off the back foot
fullish and just a touch wide of off as he drives into the covers for a single
short ball on off stump, cramping Dhoni for room as he is able to work it into midwicket
full on off stump as Bhuvi keeps it out

Williamson has another as Dhoni charges him and lofts straight down long-off's throat. Got a little too close to that to get enough elevation as this was fired in full on off stump. Big smiles in the New Zealand huddle
full toss on leg stump as he drives down to long-on
slipped out if his hands and Williamson is very quick to apologise as lobs up a full toss over waist high. Swayed away
tossed up on off stump as he drives down the ground to long-off
flighted on middle as he pushes back to the bowler
bit too short and wide outside leg as he gets on one knee and sweeps towards the long leg boundary
slower ball full and wide outside off as he looks to slice it through point. Too wide to connect
length ball on middle and leg as he turns it through square leg
slapped over mid-off as this was on a length just outside off. Makes some room outside leg and belts it away
doesn't carry through to Ronchi as he looks to guide this full length ball to third man. Edges it, but is safe
full and angled in on middle as he moves forward to defend
mid-off chases after it as bhuvi mistimes a flay through the covers. Gets just enough bat to beat Neesham
slower ball, sliding down the leg side as he turns it away to deep square leg
short ball outside off as he sways inside the line
nice and full on middle as he drives to long-on for a single
slower, length  ball, but it slides down the leg side.
slower again and Shami was completely fooled. Into the shot too early and wasn't even in position to adjust as it strikes him on the leg
quite full on middle and leg as he drills it to long-on where Peter Younghusband fields it and gets a good roar for his efforts
nudged into midwicket as this is fullish and on middle
fullish and angled in as he leans forward and whips it to deep square leg.
back of a good length on off stump as he steers it to deep third man
short and wide outside off as he throws his bat, gets a thick edge as it flies away behind point
slower ball just outside off as he looks to guide it down to third man, but is deceived by the variation in pace
swings it a way towards deep midwicket as this is on a length on middle
cut him in half as this one seams in after pitching on a fullish length. Shami was in no position to work that away as it just misses leg stump
goes for an all out slog as he gets a thick edge which flies towards third man
this time he connects and how! Fullish delivery angled in as he plonks his front foot outside the line and carts it into the crowd at cow corner
short ball on middle and leg as he ducks under it
Younghusband's dropped it this time, but it's all smiles there though. Looks for a slog as this is shortish and on middle. Gets a thick top edge and it spills straight through his hands
slower short ball as he goes for the pull and misses
this time he connects as he pulls through to deep square leg. Another well-directed short ball from Henry
short outside off stump again as he blocks it down the pitch
four for Henry on debut as he goes for cow corner, but only ends up getting a top-edge which is swallowed by the keeper
short and over middle as he goes for the pull. Misses though
fullish and outside off as he makes tons of room and looks to flay through the covers. Misses again
short ball angled in on him as he pulls, more to save himself from getting hit than anything else, as it goes down to long leg. Was in the air too

yorker to finish things off and New Zealand have taken this contest, if I can say that, by 87 runs. Middle stump knocked back as Aaron looked to chop the bat down, but is too late. The home side relishes a 4-0 defeat against a side that was No.1 when it came onto their shores
